text: aur allaah hee ne tumhaar lie us cheez mein se, jo utpann kee hai, chhaaya banaayee hai aur tumhaare lie parvaton mein guphaen banaayee hain aur tumhaare lie aise vastr banaaye hain, jo tumhe dhoop se bachaayen[1]. isee prakaar, vah tumapar apana upakaar poora karata hai, taaki tum aagyaakaaree bano
